name: The Boy With Bombs
description:
Bomb! Dash! Survive!

The Boy With Bombs is a fast paced adventure where you blast through waves of enemies in a beautiful 16-bit era aesthetic.

- Bomb your way through 8 unique zones.
- Battle never ending waves of increasingly difficult enemies.
- Collect gold to purchase various bomb and character upgrades.
- Compete for high scores on the global leaderboard.
- Completely free!

*No in-app purchases or ads.*
